body:
Comment 19: 
FWIW, I fixed my issue #2335 by adding the line "true" to the end of my ~/.bashrc.

The previous lines were sometimes false, which made the whole script fail?  I apparently
known bash even less than I thought.

Now:

$HOME/bin/test-if-from-macmini && export DISPLAY=10.0.0.11:1
true
